resources.string: For optimal performance, some files must be downloaded. If you choose not to do this now, each page will take significantly longer to load. Would you like to download the required files now?
Unable to connect to server, make sure that your Internet connection is active. Retry ?
Would you like to download the required translations now?
In order to highlight ayahs during audio playback, we need to download some files. Download them now?
Please wait for the files to download. (Resume supported)
Please wait the files are processed.
Ahmed El-Helw - Ahmed Fouad \nHussein Maher - Wael Nafee

Quran Android is a free, open source Quran application for Android. The images used are from the quran.com project, the audio comes from everyayah.com, the data used in the translations and Arabic comes from tanzil.net and quran.ksu.edu.sa 

Credits: 
 Ahmed Farra - bugfixes and many contributions. 
 Mahmoud Hossam - bugfixes. 
 @fo2ad - audio recitation support 
 @wnafee - page flip animation (based on android-page-curl project) 
 @hams_rrr - Arabic support for non-arabic phones 
 @neo_4583 - Arabic reshaper project 
 @somaiagabr - graphics and Arabic translation 
 Mehmed Mahmudoglu - Turkish localization 
 khajavi (on github) - Farsi localization 
 Rinat (Ринат Валеев) - Russian localization 

New features in this release: 
- Night mode. 
- Searching. 
- Bug fixes :) especially ICS display bug :) 

La tansawna men saleh el doaa.

- Flip your screen to landscape mode for a zoomed in version. 
- Change pages by swiping your finger across the screen. 
- Tap the screen to get a bookmark button, a slider for switching pages and audio. 
- You can fix the orientation in either landscape or portrait modes. 
- Browse and download available translations (choose Menu > Get Translations). 
- You can download as many translations as you want, yet only one translation can be active for viewing and searching. 
- Adjust translation text size to your preference via Settings. 
- Initial search implementation allows you to search the active translation via the search button. 
- On tapping the center of the screen and you will find the page bookmark option in the top left corner. tap on the bookmark button to toggle the page bookmark state. 
- You can add as many bookmarks as you'd like. 
- The application remembers the last page you were reading and displays it when you restart the app. 
- Don't forget to check out the settings.
You have no active translation set. Please set an active translation first and then search again.
You have not downloaded any translations. Please download a translation first and then search again.
You have not downloaded the arabic search pack. Please download it and try your search again.
Download the Arabic Search Database to enable Arabic Searches?
Screen will stay on while reading
Screen will turn off after idling
Application will be localized to Arabic (restart required)
Select if your device doesn\'t support Arabic
Quran page will be in fixed orientation mode
Dark background and light fonts will be used
Display popup on reaching juz\', hizb, etc.
Auto scroll to highlighted ayah while playing (in landscape)
Switch between downloaded translations. Select \'Menu > Get Translations\' to display a full list of available translations
Show ayah in Arabic above the translation
Stream audio when possible (non-gapless audio only).
Preferred download amount for non-gapless audio.
SD card should be mounted to download translations.
Not enough disk space to download
Could not download due to network error
Could not download due to permissions error
Are you sure you would like to remove the %1$s?
Unable to download the list of translations. Please try again later.
Press the search key to look up a verse
